subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] This is what I'm talking about!
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0034_01C9DDD1.AEADF830
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Yep.

And that's what I am talking about when I say you should ignore them =
and go on about your business. To argue with someone like this is pointless=
, and it just brings you down to their level.

  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: Frank Sumption 
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, =
May 25, 2009 9:31 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] This is what I'm talking about!

=





   Why I've had enough of these insane idiots in the so called paranor=
mal. God forbid anyone should question their little pearls of wisdom flowin=
g from their sacred keyboards.

   I''ve said it before, and I'll say it ag=
ain, I do this work for my own curiosity, I don't seek fame and fortune lik=
e these others do, and I have no ego to puff up to the world. I do not care=
 if anyone uses my boxes, I don't even sell the crap. It ain't gonna matter=
---the comet is on it's way! Y'all have three years, I'd use the time wisel=
y.

   I left the name off this, but anyone can probably figure out who sen=
t it, the same person that attacks many researchers in this field. 

  "Fra=
nk,
   
  You have a big mouth on that piece of shit group evp-itc come ove=
r to the---- group where I can respond to your fuckin retarded rants. You c=
all me a crack head, you senile old idiot, don't hate people for being your=
 superior in the field just because your boxes are crap now and nobody uses=
 them for anything other than dust collecters. If I were you I would go bac=
k into the bathroom sit on the bowl and think about what an obscure hasbeen=
 asshole you have become. 
   
  Come to my group and open your mouth and I=
'll take the wind right out of your fuckin sails.
   
  All is possible, no=
thing is probable"
